situation:
A beam has a width of 300mm and a total depth of 550mm. The beam has a length of 8m and is fixed at both ends. It is reinforced with 3-28mm⌀ bars at the tension side and 2-25mm⌀ bars at the compression side. Using a steel cover of 70mm, fc'=21MPa, fy=276MPa. Use 24kN/m3 as unit weight of concrete.
Superimposed Dead Load = 8kN/m
Live Load = 12 kN/m
Using alternate design method.

subquestions.question: Determine the transformed moment of inertia with respect to the neutral axis in mm<sup>4</sup>
Determine the actual stress of concrete at the midspan in MPa.
Determine the actual stress of tension steel at the midspan in MPa.
